dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool alllows spatial queries for the OSM dataset using the Overpass API.

Missing features and bugs can be issued at GitHub

tool.name: Tool

param.name: in_tag
param.expression: admin_level | amenity | boundary | building | cuisine | craft | emergency | evacuation_center | highway | cycleway | junction | historic | landuse | leisure | man_made | natural | office | place | power | public_transport | shop | sport | railway | route | tourism | waterway
param.dialogReference: The tag to be used. There is no defined set of tags but the provided list provides a good basis for widely used tags.

param.name: in_key
param.dialogReference: The key to be used. There is no defined set of keys but the provided list provides a good basis for widely used keys according to the selected tag.

param.name: in_regMode
param.expression: geocode region | define simple bounding box
param.dialogReference: Choose between a geocoded area and an extent object.

param.name: in_region
param.dialogReference:
Define a region of interest. It will be geocoded using Nominatim.

example: "Paris, France"

tool.summary:
This tool alllows spatial queries for the OSM dataset using the Overpass API.

Missing features and bugs can be issued at GitHub
tool.usage: Select a Tag and a Key and please limit your result to a narrow bounding box. If nodes for ways are missing they are selected as well.
